attributes.action: I would like the convervative party to remove from office the Desborough Repersenative as she is usless and stopping a new development for town growth and new employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the convervative party to remove from office the Desborough Repersenative as she is usless and stopping a new development for town growth and new employment. A new Tesco's is highy welcome and to remove the old vacant office/industry building which is a heath and safety risk. The Conservative Repersentative is blocking the development as it would effect her view.
